name: TowerRaid
description:
Tower Raid is a fantasy tower defense game with  a constantly extending path that you may affect. Unlock additional elements, strengthen your defenses, improve your towers and strategically expand the road to control how attackers move and rise to the position of the  greatest ruler in the kingdom.

The game is still in development, but you can try this free demo!

CONTROL SCHEME:

WASD - camera movement

R - hexagon rotation

Q and E -  camera rotation

Mouse wheel - zoom in/out

Right Mouse click - cancel upgrade

ESC - pause

GAMEPLAY:

You start with 500 in game currency with which you can shop for hexagons to expand the road towards your castle, buy towers and crystals with which you defend the castle from the enemies, and also purchase buffs.

Different hexagon biomes also affect the strength of the crystals:

Air biome - air crystals deal more damage

Earth biome - earth crystals deal more damage

Water biome - water crystals deal more damage

Desert biome - fire crystals deal more damage

The goal is to survive 30 waves of enemies, but beware! They get stronger every wave and tower you place so plan ahead!
